description: After coming home from being outdoors in the sun, playing some basketball and looking at the ladies, Tommy decides he needs a soothing shower to cool off and get fresh and clean.When he's done, he says showers always put him in the mood for something...Hmmm Tommy, I wonder what that is. Out in the living room, Tommy was already laying on the stairs, playing with his dick, which was already hard. What a horn dog!After becoming bored with the stairs, Tommy moves to the couch, where he has his favorite porn going, and a bottle of lube waiting. He's been getting a lot of requests for cum eating, so to satisfy his beloved fans, Tommy decides to slug down some of his own cream.Tasty!
title: A Taste Of Tommy
